sections.Behind the scenes: * On the [[Season 1]] Blu-ray, Catelyn narrates [[Complete Guide to Westeros]] videos on '''"[[The Old Gods and the New (Complete Guide to Westeros)|The Old Gods and the New]]"''' and '''"[[House Arryn (Complete Guide to Westeros)|House Arryn]]"'''. On the [[Season 2]] Blu-ray, she narrates [[Histories & Lore]] videos on '''"[[Robert's Rebellion (Histories & Lore)|Robert's Rebellion]]"''' and '''"[[Harrenhal (Histories & Lore)|Harrenhal]]"'''. On the [[Season 3]] Blu-ray, she narrates '''"[[House Frey (Histories & Lore)|House Frey]]"'''.
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Catelyn is proud, strong, kind and generous. She has a severe disregard for Jon Snow, whose very presence drives her to anger. She loves her five children very much and dotes on them, but also knows they need to be strong if they are to inherit leadership positions in [[the North]]. A letter received by Catelyn from her sister Lysa sets in motion the events of the novels.

According to the TV series official [[pronunciation guide]] developed for the cast and crew, "Catelyn" is pronounced "CAT-lin" ("cat" like the animal), not "Kate-lin" or "Cat-ellen". Indeed, in the TV series, she is sometimes referred to as simply "Cat" by people who know her well, like Ned Stark or Petyr Baelish.
sections.Quotes:
{{Quote|All these years and I still fell like an outsider when I come here.|'''Catelyn Stark''' to Eddard Stark in the godswood.|Winter is Coming}}
{{Quote|I wish that you were free to follow your heart but you have inherited your father's responsibilities. They come at a cost.|'''Catelyn Stark''' to Robb Stark|:Video: Game Of Thrones Season 2 The More You Love Trailer}}{{Quote|On my honor as a Tully, on my honor as a Stark, let him go or I will cut your wife's throat.|Catelyn to [[Walder Frey]]|The Rains of Castamere}}
